meanings.definition: A type of Italian pastry typically filled with cream or jam.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious cornetti for breakfast.
meanings.sent2: The bakery sells fresh cornetti every morning.
meanings.sent3: The cornetti looked so good, I almost wanted to frame it!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as sweet as a cornetti.
meanings.sent5: The scent of warm cornetti filled the room.

meanings.definition: Plural form of cornetto, a musical instrument similar to a trumpet.
meanings.sent1: The band played beautiful music with their cornetti.
meanings.sent2: I heard the sound of cornetti during the concert.
meanings.sent3: The cornetti in the orchestra seemed to have a mind of their own!
meanings.sent4: His voice soared like a cornetti in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The cornetti added a magical touch to the performance.

meanings.definition: Plural form of cornetto, a type of ice cream cone.
meanings.sent1: The children enjoyed their cornetti on a hot summer day.
meanings.sent2: I bought two cornetti for dessert after dinner.
meanings.sent3: The cornetti melted faster than I could eat them!
meanings.sent4: The ice cream shop offered a cornetti with a surprise inside.
meanings.sent5: The colorful cornetti looked like a work of art.
